name: Informational sign No. 1, transgenerational legacy
description:
Traffic signs is a collection of drawings made on the occasion of the massive marches held in Colombia since April 2021. They seek to represent different moments within this struggle, make them visible to the international public, and facilitate the recognition of situations and places of potential danger to citizens.

They use the colors of the Colombian flag to make direct reference to this conflict; but they could represent the situation of many Latin American communities and in general, the political situation of developing countries.
